summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York expressing disbelief about a Fox News report regarding Jeffrey Epstein's suicide and his alleged plan to replace his long-time attorneys. The sender shares the article link and calls the subject a 'fucking clown'.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the Fox News article about his suicide and alleged plan to replace his attorneys.

events.title: Email about Epstein suicide report
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney emails about a Fox News report on Jeffrey Epstein's suicide, expressing disbelief about claims Epstein was about to replace his long-time attorneys.

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney expresses strong disbelief about a Fox News report regarding Jeffrey Epstein's suicide.
The email specifically disputes the claim that Epstein was about to replace his long-time attorneys.
The correspondence reveals internal skepticism among prosecutors about media narratives surrounding Epstein's death.
